name: Caviar Oscietra 50gr

narrative.narrative: Known for their refined palates and appreciation of the finest delicacies, our Swedish guests will find a taste of the sea like no other with the Caviar Oscietra. Just as Sweden is renowned for its seafood culture, this exquisite caviar captures the essence of the ocean with its buttery texture and rich, nutty flavor, crafted sustainably and ethically, aligning with the nation's passion for environmental consciousness.

appeal: The Caviar Oscietra offers an indulgent yet delicate textual experience, bursting into fine pearls that melt on the tongue, providing a luxurious and creamy taste experience rivaling the finest dreams of sea-loving epicureans.

name: Amelie No2 Oysters

narrative.narrative: Our British guests, who delight in coastal fare reminiscent of their seaside holidays, will appreciate the freshness of the Amelie No2 Oysters. How these oysters evoke the salty spray of the sea and pair beautifully with a chilled glass of crisp white wine, a true nod to Britain's traditional coastal delights.

appeal: Each oyster is a mouthful of ocean splendor, with a fresh, briny essence that delivers a crisp and clean finish, complementing the tactile experience with a silky smooth texture and refreshing burst in every bite.

name: Sashimi PORTIXOL

narrative.narrative: Our German patrons appreciate a fusion of classic and contemporary, just as Sashimi PORTIXOL blends traditional Japanese precision with Mediterranean freshness. It's an offering that harmonizes raw elegance with a light and zesty tone, perfect for those who seek a nuanced taste of two worlds.

appeal: Sashimi PORTIXOL provides a silky, smooth sensation with each slice, the freshness of the fish uplifting taste buds with its purity, enhanced by delicate garnishes that add a symphony of subtle, refreshing notes.

name: Iberian cured ham

narrative.narrative: For the Swedish guests, who cherish quality and elegance, the Iberian cured ham offers a taste journey to sunny Spain, bringing the richness of dry-cured meats, celebrated in Swedish charcuterie traditions, into an Iberian context of deep, matured flavors.

appeal: Experience the fine marbling of Iberian ham that gives way to a velvety, melt-in-the-mouth sensation. Its deeply savory, nutty flavors envelop the senses, leaving a rich and luxurious mouthfeel that lingers.

name: Tiger prawns tempura

narrative.narrative: German guests, known for their penchant for combining crisp flavors with succulent seafood, will delight in the Tiger prawns tempura. This dish resonates with the German knack for perfected textures and robust taste profiles that lift the spirit with every bite.

appeal: This dish features a satisfying crunch from its light, airy tempura coating, holding within a burst of tender and juicy prawn, providing a playful balance of textures and a satisfying savory finish.

name: White sea bass ceviche

narrative.narrative: British diners often cherish the invigorating zest of ceviche, akin to their fondness for garden-fresh produce and vibrant spices. The White sea bass ceviche brings a bright, citrus-forward flavor that is as refreshing as a spring stroll along the English countryside.

appeal: Indulge in the refreshing texture of the ceviche where firm yet tender fish meets the zest of citrus, accompanied by ripe tropical notes and the satisfying crunch of fresh vegetables - an orchestra for the senses.

name: PORTIXOL Toast

narrative.narrative: Our Swedish guests will recognize the quality found in simple, elegant dishes like the PORTIXOL Toast. This dish celebrates the sophisticated pairing of fresh seafood atop crispy, well-crafted bread, akin to the open sandwiches cherished throughout Scandinavian cuisine.

appeal: Crisp artisan toast carries the delicate flavors of ocean delights, delivering a satisfying crunch followed by a soft, savory warmth that fills the senses with each bite— a playful harmony of textures.

name: Seasonal tomato tarter

narrative.narrative: Our German visitors, who appreciate the fusion of classic tastes and contemporary cuisine, will find the seasonal tomato tarter as a delightful interplay of flavors - fresh local produce maximized by elegant modern culinary techniques.

appeal: Delight in the smoothness of burrata foam that drapes over the tart, sweet notes of seasonal tomatoes. The texture offers a sophisticated surprise with every soft bite, heightened further by truffle's earthy richness.

name: Gazpacho

narrative.narrative: For our British guests, who enjoy refreshing summer soups as a staple, the Gazpacho here brings together vibrant vegetables in a chilled, invigorating blend that captures the sun-drenched gardens of Spain, much like the lush English gardens after which it takes inspiration.

appeal: Our Gazpacho is a cool, smooth blend of vibrant summer tomatoes and fresh vegetables. It wraps the palate in a refreshing embrace, the silkiness giving way to the garden's freshness with each sip.

name: Grilled artichoke

narrative.narrative: Swedish guests will relish in the delicate flavors of the Grilled artichoke, a dish that matches their appreciation for simple, honest flavors matched with sophisticated culinary preparation. This perennially cherished dish speaks to a lifestyle where quality prevails over quantity.

appeal: Char-grilled to perfection, the exterior gives a tender yet slightly smoky essence, while the interior remains soft and juicy. This sophisticated juxtaposition delivers earthy depth with each bite.

name: Fried edamame

narrative.narrative: Iconic in its simplicity, Fried edamame appeals to German guests who appreciate both health-conscious options and robust culinary craftsmanship. It combines lightly fried appeal with healthy nutrition, which matches the wholesome food traditions found in Germany.

appeal: Experience the delightful crunch that gives way to the perfectly tender beans within, infused with the earthy tones of red wine salt, offering an addictive mix of savory crisps and wholesome satisfaction.

name: Fried sweet potato

narrative.narrative: For the British guests whose affinity for chips is undeniable, our Fried sweet potato goes a step further. Enhanced with truffle mayonnaise, it offers a flavorful embarkment into the hearty and seasoned snacks typical of British pub cuisine.

appeal: Each bite presents a warm, soft interior encased in a light yet crispy shell, heightened by the rich aroma and creamy taste of truffle mayonnaise, transforming a simple joy into an indulgent experience.

name: Grilled Sea Bass

narrative.narrative: Swedish diners, who treasure the pure taste of well-cooked fish, will embrace the Grilled Sea Bass. Honoring the sea's natural flavors, it captures the lightness and delicacy appreciated in Swedish culinary traditions while employing Mediterranean flair.

appeal: Savor the flake-perfect texture of Sea Bass, grilled to achieve tender, moist flesh that unfolds with the fragrance and spice of Tom Yum broth, while marinated vegetables add a complementary crunch.

name: Red tuna

narrative.narrative: Our German guests will find Red Tuna's elegant preparation aligns with their admiration for diligently crafted, quality dishes. It's a harmonious balance of the fresh, rich taste of tuna, complemented by subtle Asian flavors favored in global German cuisine.

appeal: Offers a luxurious texture as each slice melts in the mouth. Complemented by the smooth, creamy wasabi mayonnaise, each bite delivers a wave of flavor layered over the tender tuna.

name: Cod Kokotxas 'pil-pil'

narrative.narrative: In England, the love for comforting fish dishes is profound, and our Cod Kokotxas 'pil-pil' is akin to enjoying a piece of traditional fish nestled under the spicy richness of pil-pil sauce—a comfort and a nod to flavorful meals found in British homes.

appeal: Feel the expression of culinary heritage with every forkful as the silky cod pairs beautifully with the smooth intensity of the 'pil-pil' sauce, carrying a depth of flavor that abounds with each mouthful.

name: Grilled Squid

narrative.narrative: Embodying both simplicity and depth, this Grilled Squid resonates with Swedish traditions that combine healthy, fresh ingredients with hearty flavors, mirroring the Swedish ethos of uncomplicated yet richly rewarding culinary experiences.

appeal: A perfectly grilled exterior encapsulates the tender umami heart within. Enhanced by saffron 'alioli' and delicate black rice, it enlivens the senses with its complementary textures and smoky notes.

name: Catch of the day

narrative.narrative: German guests will appreciate the chef's skill and ingredient integrity with the Catch of the day, mirroring Germany's own respect for seasonality and freshness in seafood, revealing new symphonies of flavor each day.

appeal: Catch of the day is a journey of texture and taste all on its own. From flaky to firm, each bite brings a unique experience, complemented by seasonal ingredients chosen to highlight the delicate flavors of the sea.

name: Panang curry

narrative.narrative: Both exotic and comforting, the Panang curry aligns with British guests' embrace of bold, aromatic spices from the global palate while simulating the comforting warmth found in traditional British stews.

appeal: Savor its creamy, silky texture as it wraps around the palate, delivering rich and warm spices. The perfectly cooked vegetables and nutty red rice create pleasing contrasts against the luscious curry base.

name: Homemade ravioli

narrative.narrative: German culinary tradition often brings together the delights of rich, hearty dishes. Our Homemade ravioli, filled with creamy ricotta and lush spinach, is a reflection of the equally comforting and passionate fondness for Italian-inspired cuisine in Germany.

appeal: Delicate pasta parcels enveloping creamy ricotta and fresh spinach create a soft explosion of flavor. Highlighted by the crunch of walnuts, the luxurious mouthfeel provides a delightful texture contrast.

name: Beef tenderloin steak

narrative.narrative: Our British guests, who harbor a reverence for quality cuts of meat, will find the Beef tenderloin steak to mirror beloved traditions of their country's fine dining. It's a testament to mastery, where every bite is tender and rich, a mindful celebration of each element plated.

appeal: The steak is seared to perfection, revealing a tender and juicy center with each slice. Its rich seasoning and the layered texture of the port reduction and potato mille-feuille engage the palate with a sophisticated taste.

name: Suckling Pig

narrative.narrative: Our Swedish guests, with their fondness for farm-to-table delicacies, will relish the Suckling Pig. Blending the idyllic flavors of fruit and pork, it's a taste of rural comfort that speaks across cultures, warm and fulfilling as a Nordic embrace.

appeal: Crispy skin with tender, succulent meat inside, the Suckling Pig dances over the palate. Enhanced by the subtle sweetness of plum and tomato, it offers complexity and comfort in every bite.

name: 'Angus' Sirloin Steak Tataki'

narrative.narrative: In Germany, where steak ust be treated with reverence, this 'Angus' Sirloin Steak Tataki' offers a rich and sophisticated flavor profile. Lightly seared and elegant, it appeals to those who appreciate finesse as much as fortitude in their meals.

appeal: Every slice of Tataki reveals a tenderness and aromatic allure, the seared exterior providing a hint of smokiness, paired with the subtle heat of tempura 'piquillo peppers' creating an engaging contrast for the senses.

name: Truffled wedge potatoes with rocket

narrative.narrative: For our British guests who cherish their famous roasts and side accompaniments, these Truffled wedge potatoes offer a luxurious twist with a Mediterranean essence, paying homage to high-end takes on beloved comfort foods.

appeal: Crispy outside with a fluffy, hot interior, the wedges are elevated by a decadent aroma and taste of truffle, giving a simple yet sophisticated tactile experience that pairs beautifully with the peppery rocket.

name: Ceasar salad or green

narrative.narrative: The German appreciation for both hearty and fresh flavors is echoed in our Caesar or green salads. They bring crisp lettuce and robust cheeses together in a way that satisfies a desire for familiar, yet elevated flavors.

appeal: Crisp greens meet creamy, savory dressing in a blend of crunchy textures and rich umami tones, offering a combination that's both refreshing and indulgently gratifying, bite after delicious bite.

name: Japanese mushrooms sautéed

narrative.narrative: Our Swedish visitors, who enjoy a lifelong admiration for mushrooms gracing their meals, will find the Japanese mushrooms sautéed to sit perfectly within their culinary palate, offering up an earthy, umami flavor profile.

appeal: Tender mushrooms lay soft yet resilient to the bite, their umami notes intensified by light sautéing. This simple yet complex side dish brings an array of flavor notes to the forefront in comforting richness.

name: Sautéed seasonal vegetables

narrative.narrative: British guests often enjoy the farm-fresh bounty of sautéed seasonal vegetables, akin to what you’d find in rustic countryside meals. This dish brings the richness of earthy flavors, shining brightly alongside a multitude of mains.

appeal: With each crisp and tender bite, these vegetables deliver a symphony of soft and firm textures while the natural sweet and earthy flavors come to life through expert sautéing.

name: Padrón peppers

narrative.narrative: For German diners who possess a fine appreciation for subtle, excitingly versatile snacks, Padrón peppers are a delightful introduction to Spain's traditional table, resonating in a playful mix of mild and surprising spicy notes.

appeal: These small, slightly blistered peppers offer a juicy, skin-on texture. Their intriguing taste progression—subtle and savory—offers an enticing surprise with hints of heat barely peeking through.

name: Homemade chocolate truffle

narrative.narrative: Swedish guests treasure the comforting decadence of chocolate. The Homemade chocolate truffle brings satisfaction comparable to fine Swedish confections, whispering of simplicity and richness over a dense, velvety center.

appeal: Luxuriously smooth, with each bite gently dissolving to reveal a rich, deep chocolate taste, these truffles promise an indulgent escape, whispered sweetly in each compact, succulent orb.

name: Mallorcan cheesecake

narrative.narrative: British fans of creamy, baked delights will find a wonderful story in the Mallorcan cheesecake, marrying Spanish traditions with the delicate elegance of dessert craftsmanship akin to a carefully made British tea cake.

appeal: Smooth, creamy textures mingle with soft, buttery undertones, all cradled by crunchy, sweetened crust elements full of light, vanilla, and nut aromas presenting a perfect finish.

name: Chocolate coulant

narrative.narrative: German diners who value deep, enriching desserts can revel in the Chocolate coulant, a finely crafted molten delicacy that promises an eruption of traditional chocolate richness echoing back to Germany's own passion for cocoa.

appeal: Warm chocolate flows from its molten core, drowning the senses in a river of velvety richness while a crisp outer shell adds contrast, inviting every texture-loving sweet tooth into bliss.

name: Tarte tatin (for 2)

narrative.narrative: British guests hold apple desserts quite dear. The Tarte tatin provides an experience reminiscent of the cherished apple pies and tarts of their homeland, with caramelized fruits speaking of warmth and familiarity.

appeal: Golden flaky puff pastry cradles tenderly caramelized apples in a sweet embrace, with each forkful offering a delightful play of warm, sticky-sweet, and earthy crispness.

name: French toast 'coca de patata'

narrative.narrative: Our Swedish guests, who cherish a warm, hearty breakfast or dessert, will feel the warmth of home in the French toast 'coca de patata'. Each bite connects deeply with a shared love of tradition and sweetness, so similar to Swedish fika.

appeal: Enjoy the soft, buttery warmth that meets the palate, draped in silky smooth ice cream made from sheep's milk, achieving a warm inner bliss of textures that deeply satisfies.

name: Passion Fruit Pavlova

narrative.narrative: The beloved British influences of meringue desserts shine in our Passion Fruit Pavlova, offering a mix of textures and a sweet, fruit-tinged journey reminiscent of teatime delights often adored in Britain.

appeal: A crisp, delicate shell crumbles to reveal a soft, marshmallow-like interior, accompanied by creamy sweet-whipped peaks and tart passion fruit that sing together in a symphony of light and airy indulgence.

name: Spanish and local cheese selection

narrative.narrative: Our German guests have a fine appreciation for cheese, and this varied platter offers a taste of region-specific delights that align with Germany's own valued cheese-making traditions—rich, bold, and memorable.

appeal: Experience a palette of varied textures from soft to crumbly, each cheese offering a unique, robust flavor profile that provides rich, creamy nuances enveloped by the smoky, nutty, or tangy undertones.

name: Home made ice cream

narrative.narrative: For Swedish guests fond of quality, homemade flavors, this ice cream resonates with their love of elegantly simple yet intensely flavorful desserts, drawing upon natural sweetness akin to Scandinavian dessert traditions.

appeal: Each spoonful offers a smooth, rich creaminess that coats the tongue in chilled sweetness. Fresh, bright flavors come through, delivering simplicity and refinement in texture and taste.

name: MORTITX

narrative.narrative: British diners who often enjoy dessert wines will find this sweet wine by the glass to be a treat, echoing the love of indulgent adult occasions such as afternoon teas or evening cocktails with a hint of rich flavor.

appeal: A sweet, silky elegance pulls each sip through with notes of bright fruit and smooth honeyed accents, leaving a pleasing, lingering warmth that seductively coats the palate.

name: APASIANADO DE JOSE PARIENTE

narrative.narrative: Our German visitors, who frequently elevate meals with a unique wine selection, will find in this glass a sweet, balanced expression that pairs seamlessly with the robust notes in their dish selection much like classic German pairings.

appeal: A dance of vibrant citrus aromas wrapped in succulent, velvety textures, this wine tips delicately between sweet and dry, leaving pleasing notes of ripe fruit and a smooth, lingering aftertaste.

name: VALVERAN 20

narrative.narrative: With a penchant for cider, our German guests will enjoy this sweet wine, a harmonious fruit-driven journey that stands among the grand German cider tradition, offering an echo of familiar comforts.

appeal: A refined blend of juicy apples enhances the palate with a burst of sweetness and acidic balance, each sip resonating with fine frothy effervescence that refreshes as it delights.
ingredients: Manzanas Sidra de Hielo Raxao y Durona de Tresali

name: OREMUS ASZU 3

narrative.narrative: Swedish connoisseurs of dessert wines will find much to admire in the OREMUS ASZU 3, its aged complexity embodying a tradition of savoring sweet wines alongside the joys of well-paired sweets and cheeses.

appeal: A rich, honeyed texture effortlessly complements the palate with a subtle balance of sweetness. Its multi-layered notes of stone fruit and subtle spice echo lightly, offering a uniquely complex, engaging sensory journey.
ingredients: Puttonyos Furmint, Harslevelu, Mascat de Lunel

name: Hamburger

narrative.narrative: Children visiting from Britain will find comfort in the Hamburger, a beloved classic akin to their well-known British beef patties, fitting perfectly into the adventuresome spirit of seeking familiar joys while traveling.

appeal: Juicy, savory beef nestled in a fluffy bun provides an all-time favorite tactile melange, combined with the satisfying crispy crunch of golden fries.

name: Grilled beef

narrative.narrative: This Grilled beef option serves German children who appreciate the comforting flavors of well-prepared meats, much like the delicious bites found in family-friendly roasts back home.

appeal: Tender, grilled beef offers a simple yet cozy experience while the choice of crispy fries or fresh salad adds appealing dimensions of taste and texture.

name: Home Made Meatballs

narrative.narrative: Swedish families will feel at home as these home made meatballs recreate the beloved tastes and comforting shapes of their traditional meals, crafted with nostalgia and flavor.

appeal: Soft and juicy, each bite of these meatballs reveals familiar comforting flavors, paired seamlessly with creamy mashed potatoes, providing a satisfying and heartwarming meal.

name: Grilled Fish

narrative.narrative: For Swedish youngsters, accustomed to enjoying fresh seafood, this Grilled Fish echoes the pure, straightforward joys of home dishes, feeding both curiosity and nostalgia.

appeal: Delicate yet firm, the grilled fish offers a mild, fresh flavor that's easy on the palate—perfect for youthful tastes, accompanied by nourishing grains or golden seasoned potatoes.

name: Chicken Breast

narrative.narrative: British children who adore juicy, well-prepared chicken will enjoy this trusted favorite, reminiscent of simple yet fulfilling meals adored in family-friendly settings.

appeal: A tender, juicy chicken breast with a delightful, lightly charred exterior tailored to young palates, paired with the versatile option of crispy fries or crisp salad for added crunch.

name: Pasta Bolognesa or Tomato Sauce

narrative.narrative: German children will relish in the classic flavors of Pasta Bolognese similar to the beloved Italian culinary influences found within German homes—a comfortingly familiar dish with every bite.

appeal: Enticing layers of flavorful sauce envelop al dente pasta, with a choice of hearty Bolognese or bright Tomato sauce, offering satisfying warmth and savory appeal perfect for littler appetites.

name: Ice Cream

narrative.narrative: Swedish children who revel in simple pleasures will find a joyful moment in each scoop of Ice Cream, just like cherished summer outings and sweet holiday treats shared with family.

appeal: Pure, creamy sweetness twirls over the tongue in a chilled, luscious landscape, each flavor fresh and inviting, promising delight even in its simplicities.

name: Fruit Salad

narrative.narrative: British children who enjoy refreshing and healthy snacks will find joy in Fruit Salad, offering a colorful mix reminiscent of picnic days in sunlit gardens back home.

appeal: A vibrant medley of fresh fruits creates a symphony of sweet and tangy flavors. Each piece bursts with natural juices, uplifting taste buds with refreshing, juicy textures.

name: Milkshake

narrative.narrative: German children will be at home with the playful concoction of a Milkshake, reminiscent of family outings where such sweet treats are customary, promising delight with each sip.

appeal: Velvety smooth and creamy, each thick, luscious sip offers a whimsical delight, combined with flavors both rich and nostalgic, comforting in their sweet, frosty embrace.
